titleInfo.title: Optimal coding strategies for certain permuting channels

mods.abstract: We give optimal coding strategies for nonprobabilistic permuting (especially, "trapdoor") channels and also for a permuting relay channel. Our results open the door to a coding theory for nonprobabilistic (or deterministic) channels with memory.
